name: InSaNitY (Chester)
description:
This game was my very first "serious" project on RPG Maker. It's far from perfect and will probably be on forever hiatus (except if I do a remake one day) but I felt like it should be on my profile just like my most recent projects. 

If you want to give it a go, you can find a complete walkthrough of the released chapters on the game's website.

And that's it! Have fun with this spooky old tale of mine!
